channel.title: Mopar please fix status page
channel.description:
Your PhP/MySQL fucked up somewhere in there. When I press submit when first registering a server.
Warning: Parameter 2 to mysqli_stmt::bind_param() expected to be a reference, value given in /home/mopar/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/ss_sources/util.php on line 188
Warning: Parameter 2 to mysqli_stmt::bind_param() expected to be a reference, value given in /home/mopar/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/ss_sources/util.php on line 188
Warning: Parameter 2 to mysqli_stmt::bind_param() expected to be a reference, value given in /home/mopar/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/ss_sources/util.php on line 188
Please fix because I'd like to advertise my server soon.

item.title: Mopar please fix status page
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Mr. Bobby:

if its just a warning then why arent servers going up even after days and days of being posted?

If it’s been over 24 hours your server has been deleted and you can post it again. Servers are up and it is working, look at all the recently posted servers:
https://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?sort=time&desc

Read full topic

item.title: Mopar please fix status page
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Mr. Bobby:

no its not, he said he just hid those errors so people would think its fixed, ive still been trying to add my server for like a week now and it wont go up.

Server Status page [w/ Source Code]

[size=18pt]It’s not an error, it’s a warning, as it says.[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Mopar please fix status page
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:1252, topic:275446”][quote author=Lethal234 link=topic=363862.msg3348310#msg3348310 date=1285018004]
My server won’t approve.

When I register it I get this MYSQL error

Warning: Parameter 2 to mysqli_stmt::bind_param() expected to be a reference, value given in /home/mopar/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/ss_sources/util.php on line 188

Warning: Parameter 2 to mysqli_stmt::bind_param() expected to be a reference, value given in /home/mopar/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/ss_sources/util.php on line 188

Warning: Parameter 2 to mysqli_stmt::bind_param() expected to be a reference, value given in /home/mopar/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/ss_sources/util.php on line 188
[/quote]

It’s not an error, it’s a warning, as it says.[/quote]

You should pm mitb.

Read full topic

item.title: Mopar please fix status page
item.dc:creator: @fpkers fpkers
item.description:
@fpkers wrote:

I’m pretty sure it does. It’s not working properly. I’ve registered about 10 servers and I know you can’t click register more than once without it saying “You have already registered… Wait…”

Something’s wrong with it.

Read full topic

Please fix because I’d like to advertise my server soon.[/quote]I don’t think that has anything to do with it. You just have to wait until your server is approved.
